metadata.title: CVE-2021-41801 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The ReplaceText extension through 1.41 for MediaWiki has Incorrect Access Control. When a user is blocked after submitting a replace job, the job is still run, even if it may be run at a later time (due to the job queue backlog)

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
